name: Kaikoura Sea Side Lodge
description:
Located on Kaikoura's favourite Swim/Surf beach, with the best views & location in town, We are walking distance to the best attractions, bars, Restaurants & seafood BBQ, Fyffe house, Seal colony, the look-out, dolphin encounter and so much more!

Kaikoura Seaside lodge is family owned and operated; we are passionate about providing a true kiwi hospitality, sharing our culture,  local knowledge, & our love for the environment. We are a small boutique hostel/lodge with self check-in  (so you can arrive at your leisure) with 12 rooms available including Dorms, Twins, Doubles and Family's options. There are 4 shared bathrooms located over both levels, as well as a private bathroom with shower and toilet reserved for those with children, disabilities or requiring a bit more privacy.  A beautiful sun filled Tv lounge to chill-out, full Kitchen facilities, and a dining room with Panoramic Ocean & Mountain views that rival some of the best in the world. Outside we have a courtyard seating, BBQ area and Kids area (with spring free trampoline) overlooking the ocean and mountain views. 
We offer laundry facilities (coin operated), Snack shop, Free WiFi,  and also have Paddleboards, Kayak, Fishing and Snorkelling gear available for hire..

Property Policies and Conditions:
- Cancellation Policy: First night accommodation chargeable for no shows, amendments or cancelations with 24 hours of check-in.
- Check In: Self Check-in from 2pm
- Check Out: 10am
- Onsite Parking available on FIFS basis


General:
Online Check in information and terms sent 10 days prior to arrival, please ensure this is completed for your self-check in codes via email day of arrival. Assisted check-in available by request.

We can't wait to welcome you & share our we piece of paradise with you, at Kaikoura Seaside lodge!

groupInformation.terms: Group Booking are subject to Availability and Via request
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
Cancel free of charge up to 4 weeks prior to arrival
Cancelations made within 4 weeks of the booking are non-refundable
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
-Check-in time from 2pm (Early check in subject to availability) 
-Check-out time is by 10:00 am
-All guests are expected to be courteous of others sharing the space
-Quiet hours are 10pm - 8am to ensure everyone has a good night sleep
-Wash & put away your dishes, wipe down bench/tables after use & label your food, 
-Room Keys to be returned to the basket at reception on check out, missing keys are charged at $50.00 per key
-Kitchen area is closed for gathering after 10pm and between 1030 - 1130am for cleaning.
-No sleeping in common areas
-Windows and doors to be kept closed after dark to keep moths and kelpies out which are highly attracted to light.
-Damaged property, excessive cleaning, alcohol spills or stains removal will be charged to your credit card at material/labour and incurred cost plus 20%
-Intimidating behaviour will result in the immediate eviction from the premiss & non-refundable cancellation of your booking.

In case of cancelation or amendment of booking 48 hours prior to arrival charges apply, after which the booking becomes non-refundable

Upon cancellation of booking, the refund of the booking amount will be initiated. The booking amount after deduction of cancellation charges and taxes, as applicable, will be credited into the bank account of the Customer using the same payment mode (i.e. debit card/ credit card/ net-banking) by which the booking was made by the Customer. The refund process may take 10-15 business days.

Children up-to 2 Years of age can stay free (cribs subject to availability). Additional charges may be applicable for children between 5 and 12 years. 13 years will be charged as per extra adult rate.

houseRules.notes:
Property Policies and Conditions:

- Cancellation Policy: 24 hours.
- Check In: 2pm-10pm
- Check Out: 10am
- Payment upon arrival by cash, debit cards and credit cards. This property may pre-authorise your card before arrival.

General:

- Reception hours: 8am-11am, 2pm-8pm.
- Doors to the hostel are locked at 10pm, however a door code is provided for late entry.
- No alcohol in the hostel afer 10:30pm.
- No alcohol or eating in the rooms.
- $2 towel hire.
- Maximum stay is 14 days.
